short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enter the URL of your webshop, highlight your product details, select product pages and let AI generate your ads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: InstantAd empowers marketers to independently generate high-quality dynamic product ads by selecting brand and product elements from their webshop. With the power of AI, you can create personalized and on-brand ads in minutes. Ready, set, advertise!
